name: A Birthday in the Forest
description:
A minigame to celebrate Fauna's birthday! 🎉 Gather saplings, slice birthday cake, and snuggle with Snail

Tap the buttons corresponding to the activity and try to get as far as you can within the time limit!

ZXC are displayed, but ASD and the arrow keys also work

If you encounter any bugs or have feedback, feel free to let me know in the comments.  You can also reach out to me on twitter: @MikoteyP

Hope you enjoy it!

This is a fan game made following the Hololive Derivative Works Guidelines (https://en.hololive.tv/terms). Hololive and its talents copyrights are owned by COVER corp ©2016. I am in no way associated with Hololive or Cover corp. If there is any content that is infringing on Hololive  guidelines or content that was falsely distributed under CC0, you can contact me at mikotey@gmail.com and I will try to resolve it asap
